turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Was I to order pizza from Bella Lunas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two pizzas medium. I need one of them to be a chicken barbecue the other one supreme.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium pizzas, 1 chicken bbq and 1 supreme, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make them both thin-crust as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that to the order, do you authorize the charge of $38?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
